title: Ownership Structure of Acorda Therapeutics Inc Stock

content.text: As of the latest filing, Vanguard Group Inc. is the largest institutional shareholder, owning approximately 9.33% of Acorda Therapeutics Inc stock. Other major institutional shareholders include BlackRock Inc. with a stake of 8.06%, and Dimensional Fund Advisors LP with a stake of 7.54%.

Insiders also have a significant ownership stake in Acorda Therapeutics Inc. CEO Ron Cohen holds approximately 2.52% of the company's stock, while CFO David Lawrence owns around 0.37%. Other notable insiders with ownership stakes include Chief Medical Officer Enrique Carrazana (0.10%) and Chief Scientific Officer Burkhard Blank (0.09%).

news.headline: Acorda Therapeutics, Inc.'s (NASDAQ:ACOR) Shares Bounce 53% But Its Business Still Trails The Industry
news.summary: Acorda Therapeutics, Inc. ( NASDAQ:ACOR ) shareholders are no doubt pleased to see that the share price has bounced 53...
